04/02/2023 - Initiated contact with Siemens' Sales Operations Manager, Mark Bennett, introducing Dealstream's sales automation solution. Scheduled a discovery call for February 10 to explore Siemens' sales challenges.

10/02/2023 - Conducted an in-depth call with Mark Bennett, discussing Siemens' sales processes and identifying pain points related to lead prioritization and data visibility. Discovered a need for streamlined collaboration and improved sales forecasting.

01/03/2023 - Prepared a comprehensive proposal outlining how Dealstream addresses Siemens' pain points. Included indicative pricing to provide a preliminary understanding of the investment required. Submitted the proposal and pricing for Siemens' review.

15/03/2023 - Conducted the first demonstration of Dealstream, showcasing lead scoring, data analytics, and collaborative features. Highlighted how Dealstream can enhance Siemens' sales efficiency and decision-making. Gathered initial feedback from Mark and his team.

05/04/2023 - Analyzed the feedback received after the first demonstration. Scheduled a call with Siemens to discuss potential customizations to align Dealstream with Siemens' unique sales processes. Explored how Dealstream can integrate with Siemens' existing CRM system.

20/04/2023 - Collaborated with Siemens' sales team to customize Dealstream according to their specific requirements. Addressed concerns related to integration and data security. Planned the second demonstration to showcase the customized features.

Received positive feedback and specific inquiries about integration with Siemens' reporting tools.

Subsequent discussions will involve finalizing pricing, contractual terms, and potential implementation timelines. RFP is now due they have sent the RFP and we need to respond.
